ModMetaData.name: Craftable
ModMetaData.author: Mawy
ModMetaData.description:
First of all, this is a my first mod made for a personal need. It may be out of balance or undergo changes.
This mod allows you to manufacture most of the items locked in Rimworld and Royalty, grouping all those items in one mod instead of several.
Add several investigations using the techprint system and requiring a medium-high amount of investigation to unlock the technologies necessary for the creation of the objects. Add:
Materials
Plasteel Hyperweave Synthread Neutroamine Glitterworld Medicine Luciferium Broadshield Core
Weapons
Monosword (and persona) Plasmasword (and persona) eushammer (and persona) Eltex Staff
Apparel
Eltex shirt Eltex robe Eltex vest Eltex helmet Eltex skullcap
